nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水产部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水产部
en: Ministry of Aquatic Products of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1956年至1970年间存在的国务院组成部门，负责管理国家水产事业。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that existed from 1956 to 1970, responsible for the administration of national aquatic products industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑师，曾主持设计中华人民共和国水产部办公大楼。
description.en: A Chinese architect who led the design of the office building for the Ministry of Aquatic Products of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国商业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商业部
en: Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，主管商业、贸易等事务。此Wikitext中提及的为1993年撤销的旧商业部。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for commerce, trade, and other affairs. The one mentioned in this Wikitext is the former ministry which was dissolved in 1993.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国内贸易部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国内贸易部
en: Ministry of Internal Trade of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责国内贸易管理。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the administration of domestic trade.

nodes.id: 中华全国供销合作总社

zh-cn: 中华全国供销合作总社
en: All China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives

description.zh-cn: 中国全国性供销合作社的联合组织，为集体所有制性质。
description.en: The national federation of supply and marketing cooperatives in China, which is under collective ownership.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人大常委会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 1st National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 1st National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中国由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农林部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农林部
en: Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1970年由中华人民共和国农业部、中华人民共和国林业部、中华人民共和国农垦部、中华人民共和国水产部四部合并成立的国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council formed in 1970 by the merger of the Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Forestry, Ministry of State Farms and Land Reclamation, and Ministry of Aquatic Products.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、社会活动家，曾任中华人民共和国水产部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and social activist who served as the Minister of Aquatic Products of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人大常委会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水产部

description.zh-cn: 在第四十次会议上决定设立中华人民共和国水产部。
description.en: Decided to establish the Ministry of Aquatic Products of the People's Republic of China at its 40th meeting.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水产部

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，水产部的工作处于停滞状态。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the work of the Ministry of Aquatic Products was in a state of stagnation.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国农林部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水产部

description.zh-cn: 因农业系统各部委合并成立中华人民共和国农林部，中华人民共和国水产部被撤销。
description.en: The Ministry of Aquatic Products was dissolved due to the merger of several ministries in the agricultural sector to form the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水产部

description.zh-cn: 担任中华人民共和国水产部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of the Ministry of Aquatic Products of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国水产部

description.zh-cn: 主持设计了中华人民共和国水产部使用的办公大楼。
description.en: Led the design of the office building used by the Ministry of Aquatic Products of the People's Republic of China.
